name: Fiery Family
commands: Oh, thank you for accompanying me home!
A pleasure, I'm glad we could work together, Blazing.
I trust we will meet the Count?
Ah! Blazing, how is my boy?
Very well, father!|I may not have seen the festival, but I managed to meet new friends!
And that would be... You two?|Oh! P-Prince Sages?!
And I, Sal, his loyal knight.
How rude of me not to introduce myself.|Count Ignatius Ogier Phyron, glad to be acquainted.|I wish circumstances were better for you.|But I do extend my welcomes, as well as my thanks.
Yes, things are rough.|But we'll pull through, with your aid, I assume?
I cannot promise anything...|The acts committed that day are a spitting at the Goddess.|...Though I do not believe it to be your acts.
I understand being shrewd, after all, Grahment is hardly unified, right?
Exactly, Duke Hogarth von Ilkrest is most vocal in opposition.|While Marquess Zio is in support.
Regrettably, unheard.|Nobody knows where they are...|You don't think...
Either way, most of us are reluctant to take sides as of current.|Though given you guided my son home... I trust your morality.
Please Father, allow me to travel with them!|I must uncover the truth myself, for the Goddess!
I raised a young man, with flickering conviction...|It's almost bringing a tear to my eyes...
We will protect him with our lives, trust us.
I cannot allow you to leave empty handed.|Since Blazing is your companion now, this is for you, son.
Sadly not.|I'm afraid your old man hasn't given up yet.|I'll need it to defend our realm.
Aww... But, I understand.|I will become responsible enough for it, one day.
Thank you, Count Phyron, for your kind-of support.
Of course, I know the ramifications of my son aiding you...|So be it, I trust my family, always.|I bid you safe travels.|You might need it, with how those bloodhound Monsdorians operate.
